desc: Puppernickel is Hillsboro’s BEST dog baRkery and pet reTail store. We provide homemade all-natural dog birthday cakes, dog treats, pet supplies, CBD oil and CBD products for both pets and people, dog chew toys, paw-ty supplies, dog food and cat food and more. Visit us to check out what we have to offer.

layout.text: Located at 133 SE 3rd Avenue, Hillsboro OR 97123.

Hiya, We are Puppernickel! Downtown Hillsboro’s First Doggy BaRkery and source for all natural, wholesome dog treats made with human grade ingredients that are human tested and pup approved. We take quality and sustainability seriously, our ingredients are sourced locally whenever possible, and we are committed to using only natural and minimally processed ingredients that have no added salts, sugars, additives or preservatives.
Bone Appetit!
